title: 3M Adhesive Transfer Tapes
content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter of 3M products since 1994, including their adhesive transfer tapes. We combine 3M adhesives with various elastomeric substrates and convert them per customer specified requirements.
description: SRP is a Preferred Converter of 3M Adhesive Transfer Tape. SRP has been providing custom converted products to various industries since 1951.

seo.title: 3M Adhesive Transfer Tapes
seo.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter of 3M Adhesive Transfer Tape. SRP has been providing custom converted products to various industries since 1951.

sections.title: 3M 100MP
sections.content:
• Excellent temperature and chemical resistance
  • Exceptional shear holding strength at elevated temperatures
  • Strong bond to metals and high surface energy plastics
  • Polyester liner provides excellent die-cutting surface

sections.title: 3M 200MP
sections.content:
• Up to 400⁰F short-term heat resistance
  • Excellent solvent resistance
  • Excellent shear strength to resist slippage and edge lifting
  • Humidity, UV, Chemical, Temperature and Water Resistance

sections.title: 3M 300MP
sections.content:
• Suitable for bonding to most surfaces
  • Excellent bond to various fabricated foams, fabrics, substrates
  • Good shear strength at elevated temperatures
  • Humidity, UV, Chemical, Temperature and Water Resistance

sections.title: 3M 300
sections.content:
• excellent adhesion to a wide variety of surfaces, including low surface energy plastics and foam
  • Available in several thicknesses for a wide variety of surface bonding
  • Variety of liner configurations
  • Humidity, UV, Chemical, Temperature and Water Resistance

sections.title: 3M 300LSE
sections.content:
• Provides high bond strength to most surfaces, including many low surface energy plastics such as polypropylene and powder coated paints
  • Excellent bond to low surface energy plastics such as, polypropylene and powder coatings.
  • Excellent adhesion to lightly oiled surfaces typical of machine parts.
  • Thickness range of 2.0 mils, 3.5 mils, 5.0 mils and 8.5 mils for use on smooth, or rough surfaces.
  • Extremely smooth adhesive for excellent graphics appearance.
  • Humidity, UV, Chemical, Temperature and Water Resistance

sections.title: 3M Scrim Reinforced
sections.content:
• Specifically designed for difficult bonding applications
  • Bonds to a wide variety of materials
  • High peel and tack
  • Aggressive adhesive with excellent quick stick
  • Low VOC and odor
  • No primers needed to promote adhesion

blocks.title: What can 3M Adhesives and Tapes do for your product and process?
blocks.content:
• Build strong, durable products
  • Improve appearance and aesthetics
  • Lower production and material costs
  • Build products with a continuous bond line
  • Distribute stress along the entire joint
  • Bond and seal simultaneously
  • Wider material selection for assemblies
  • Bond dissimilar materials

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• Gasketing & Sealing
  • Bonding & Attaching
  • Battery Pads & Cushions
  • LED Lighting

materials.title: 3M Adhesives & Tapes
materials.content: SRP combines 3M Adhesives with various elastomeric substrates and converts them to your custom gasket and seal requirements. .fullframe {    height: 500px;    padding-bottom: 86px;}From repositionable to permanent, 3M adhesive tape can be readily matched to the substrate and stress characteristics needed in the joint. Our custom fabricated 3M adhesives and tapes products can provide many solutions to countless applications using an array of different types of materials. Some of these solutions and benefits are listed below.Replace Mechanical FastenersSpeed up your overall assembly process and improve product aesthetics and strength by replacing mechanical fasteners with 3M Adhesive Tape. Unlike screws and rivets, custom 3M Adhesive Tapes distribute stress evenly over the entire bonded area. With uniform stress distribution of adhesives and tapes, lighter and thinner materials can be used without having to worry about distortion, splitting, or crazing. This also reduces the chance for rust, corrosion, and water penetration. 3M Adhesives Tapes dampen vibration while imparting flexibility to a joint or bonded area for the ultimate hold.Join Dissimilar MaterialsEnhance the performance of hard-to-bond surfaces and solve the adhesion challenges of dissimilar materials with 3M Adhesive Tapes and 3M Double Sided Adhesive Tapes. These materials bond to a wide range of substrates from metals, wood, glass, plastics and ceramics. This includes “hard to bond,” low surface energy materials.Increase Speed and Productivity Improve aesthetics and performance while boosting overall speed and productivity with 3M adhesives and tapes. Reduce process steps such as weld grinding and sealing individual penetrations from screws, nuts and bolts. Many tape and adhesive technologies require little operator training, reducing labor costs.Improve appearance and aesthetics3M adhesive tape is generally hidden between the bonded substrates, offering nearly invisible fastening. Surfaces stay smooth and clean for a more attractive appearance and less surface refinishing. Why Choose SRP For Custom 3M Adhesive Tape Products?SRP has been a Preferred Converter of 3M products for over 25 years. We provide our customers with everything from material sampling and product prototyping to full manufacturing, packaging, and delivery. We provide value to our customers by delivering exceptional customer service, engineering solutions, and quality products to meet their every need.
materials.description: SRP is a 3M Preferred Converter for their line of pressure sensitive adhesives in the 3M converter market product line.

suppliers.title: 3M
suppliers.content:
The benefits of being a 3M Preferred Converter:

  • Access to High-Performance Products – 3M is the leader in creating products, such as 3M™ VHB™ Foam Tape, that improve lives, enhance homes, and inspire the innovation of tomorrow.
  • Employee Training – The 3M Converter University provides us extensive knowledge on 3M products and technologies.
  • Networking – Using 3M’s extensive network allows us to work more efficiently in all areas of our business.
  • Extended Customer Benefits – We receive discounts and favorable lead times, which we extend to our customers.
  • Advisory Board Membership – SRP is on the 3M Advisory Board for Converter Markets.
  • 3M Innovation Center – We have access to the 3M Innovation Center in St. Paul, MN to give our customers a look at 3M’s new and existing technologies.
  • Support – As a Preferred Converter, SRP is supported by a team of 3M sales representatives.

From repositionable to permanent, 3M adhesive tape can be readily matched to the substrate and stress characteristics needed in the joint. Our custom fabricated 3M adhesives and tapes products can provide many solutions to countless applications using an array of different types of materials by converting them into custom gaskets and seals.
suppliers.description: Over 50 years working with 3M gives us the opportunity to provide you VIP service from material sampling to prototyping—to full manufacturing, packaging, and delivery.
